User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

A partial download manager dialog (missing the title bar) pops up over the front of any other application. It seems to happen each time the progress bar gets updated. It's noticeable on slow, large downloads, and effectively prevents doing anything else until the download completes.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Initiate a large slow download.
2. Switch to any application.
3.

Actual Results:  
See 'Details' test.

Expected Results:  
I expected the dialog to remain behind whatever window had the focus instead of popping in front of it.

My machine and FF install are about as plain vanilla as it gets. This wasn't a problem in previous versions.
